reasoning: Perimembranous VSDs are the most common type of VSD (~70-80% of all VSDs). Overall VSD incidence ~250 per 100k live births globally; perimembranous accounts for ~150 per 100k births. Reported as incidence at birth. Well-documented congenital heart defect with established epidemiological data from cardiac registries and population-based studies. Moderate confidence due to variability in reporting metrics (births vs person-years).
source: WHO Global Registry of Birth Defects; Multiple cardiac epidemiology studies
